name: Hipster BBQ
description: Made with pale ale and Lawry’s Seasoned Salt, this drink whets the appetite for a juicy steak.
keywords: lime juice, pale ale, vodka, summer
recipeIngredient: 1 teaspoon lime zest, more for garnish
5 shakes Lawry’s Seasoned Salt, more for garnish

recipeInstructions.text: Pour vodka, lime juice, 1 tablespoon lime zest, 5 shakes seasoned salt and ice cubes into a cocktail shaker and shake.
Strain into pilsner glass. Add fresh ice. Pour ale in slowly to fill glass. Garnish with more lime zest and seasoned salt.
